mapping.sql: SELECT a1.XID,a1.FILE_NAME,a1.JSP_DATA,a1.VERSION FROM x_jsp_version a1 WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT xid FROM x_jsp_sync b1 WHERE a1.XID=b1.XID) UNION ALL SELECT a2.XID,a2.FILE_NAME,a2.JSP_DATA,a2.VERSION FROM x_jsp_version a2,x_jsp_sync b2 WHERE a2.xid=b2.xid AND b2.sysid=#sysId# AND a2.version>b2.version
select a.XID,a.FILE_NAME,a.JSP_DATA,a.VERSION from x_jsp_version a where a.version=#versionId# and a.xid=#reportId#
select * from x_jsp_sync t where t.xid=#xid# and sysid=#sysid#
update x_jsp_sync t set t.version=#version#,sync_time=#time()# where t.sysid=#sysid# and t.xid=#xid#
